title: The Shadows of History
description: If you asked her, she would tell you she wasn't the right one. Diana May Hail was never the bravest, most athletic or even the smartest. Yet, she was chosen. Chosen to lead a band of her planetâ€™s greatest heroes in a war that threatens to embroil the very fabric of time. Now she will have to face her past in order to face an enemy whose wrath has known no equal; past, present or future. To survive she will have to endure cruelty and seduction that could scarcely be imagined.
author: Nicole Hughes
